= NautilusSvn v0.12 branch =

== Dependencies ==

  * python-configobj
  * python-pyinotify

== Running ==
{{{
xhost +local: # This is required to be able to connect to the X Server after sudoing

sudo adduser nautilussvn
sudo -i -u nautilussvn

svn checkout http://nautilussvn.googlecode.com/svn/branches/v0.12/ ~/nautilussvn

mkdir -p ~/.nautilus/python-extensions
ln -s ~/nautilussvn/nautilussvn/lib/extensions/nautilus/__init__.py ~/.nautilus/python-extensions/NautilusSvn.py
mkdir -p ~/.icons
ln -s ~/nautilussvn/nautilussvn/data/icons/hicolor ~/.icons/ 

export PYTHONPATH="$PYTHONPATH:/home/$USER/nautilussvn/"
mkdir -p /tmp/nautilussvn_nautilus-testing
export TMPDIR=/tmp/nautilussvn_nautilus-testing
nautilus --no-desktop .
}}}
